p: To compare the chemical and phase compositions of corrosion products obtained in the simulation tests with those collected from a leaking pipeline, the corroded specimens covered with corrosion products were investigated by EDS and XRD. Figure 8 shows the EDS analysis results. From the figure, the main elements include Fe and O for all the specimens, and the chemical compositions of corrosion products are the same as those of the corrosion products collected from the leaking pipeline ( Figure 5). Figure 9 presents the XRD spectra of corrosion products, namely, Fe 3O 4, Fe 2O 3, FeO, FeCO 3 and FeO(OH). FeO(OH) has the largest share in the corrosion scale.
